components.name: checks_description_1
components.text: Sump Pump is operating in remote, and on

components.name: checks_description_4
components.text: Eye wash and safety shower checked

components.name: checks_description_6
components.text: Confirm heat trace is operating (lights at back of the PP next to the door)

components.name: checks_description_7
components.text: Strainer basket cleaned after every mix.No holes in basket

components.name: checks_description_8
components.text: Do not hose down metering pumps.

components.name: checks_description_9
components.text: Ensure gland seal water is flowing into the sumps (next to the recirculating pump and high shear mixer)

components.name: checks_description_10
components.text: Catch basin next to leach berm: check for presence of liquid

components.name: checks_description_11
components.text: Hazardous waste bags deposited on top of sea can in plant or dedicated sea can outside, when full

components.name: checks_description_12
components.text: PPE stocked in dry (Tychem and nitrile gloves)

components.name: checks_description_13
components.text: Dry is left clean, full garbage emptied

components.name: checks_description_14
components.text: Mandatory cleaning of floors, sinks and table/shelves required on Sunday nightshift
